subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: As much as we love to revel with the victor, none of us knows what it’s like to win 15 Grand Slams and almost all of us know what it’s like to have a dream crushed.
snippet: As much as we love to revel with the victor, none of us knows what it’s like to win 15 Grand Slams and almost all of us know what it’s like to have a dream crushed.
